    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public static ApiRequestHeadersSignature sign(java.lang.String sharedSecret,
                                              HttpRequestInfo requestInfo)
        Sign a HTTP request with the provided apiKey and sharedSecret.
        Parameters:
        sharedSecret - Shared secret configured in gateway.
        requestInfo - Information about the request that will be sent to the gateway.
        Returns:
        Signature that must be set on the request before sending it to the gateway.

      • verifySignature

        public static void verifySignature(ApiRequestHeadersSignature incomingSignature,
                                   HttpRequestInfo incomingRequestInfo,
                                   java.time.Instant now,
                                   java.time.Duration allowedTimeDelta,
                                   java.lang.String sharedSecret)
        Validates if an incoming request was made within an allowed timeframe and with the correct signature.
        Parameters:
        incomingSignature - Signature headers of the incoming payment gateway request (callback).
        incomingRequestInfo - Incoming payment gateway request (callback).
        now - Timestamp the request was received.
        allowedTimeDelta - Allowed age of the request (to avoid replay attacks).
        sharedSecret - Expected shared secret
        Throws:
        java.lang.VerifyError - If the the request was not made within allowedTimeDelta or the signature didn't match.

      • isValidSignature

        public static boolean isValidSignature(ApiRequestHeadersSignature incomingSignature,
                                       HttpRequestInfo incomingRequestInfo,
                                       java.time.Instant now,
                                       java.time.Duration allowedTimeDelta,
                                       java.lang.String sharedSecret)
        Checks if an incoming request was made within an allowed timeframe and with the correct signature.
        Parameters:
        incomingSignature - Signature headers of the incoming payment gateway request (callback).
        incomingRequestInfo - Incoming payment gateway request (callback).
        now - Timestamp the request was received.
        allowedTimeDelta - Allowed age of the request (to avoid replay attacks).
        sharedSecret - Expected shared secret
        Returns:
        true if the request was made within allowedTimeDelta and the signature matched.

      • isTimelySignature

        public static boolean isTimelySignature(HttpRequestInfo incomingRequestInfo,
                                        java.time.Instant now,
                                        java.time.Duration allowedTimeDelta)
        Checks if an incoming request was made within an allowed timeframe.
        Parameters:
        incomingRequestInfo - Incoming payment gateway request (callback).
        now - Timestamp the request was received.
        allowedTimeDelta - Allowed age of the request (to avoid replay attacks).
        Returns:
        true if the request was made within allowedTimeDelta.
